mapper.select: SELECT A.ibutcher, A.NAME, A.location, A.information, ifnull(AVG(C.star),0) AS star,A.`x`, A.`y` FROM t_butcher_shop AS A JOIN t_but_menu AS B ON A.ibutcher = B.ibutcher JOIN t_but_review C ON C.ibutcher = A.ibutcher WHERE A.ibutcher = #{ibutcher}
SELECT a.ibutcher ,a.ireview,c.nickname,a.star,a.review FROM t_but_review a JOIN t_user c ON a.iuser = c.iuser WHERE a.ibutcher = #{ibutcher}
